titleStmt.title: A collection of new songs with a thorow-bass to each song, for the harpsichord, theorbo, lute, or spinett / sett to musick by Mr. Gillier.
titleStmt.author: Gillier, Jean Claude, 1667-1737.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall for Henry Playford,
